name: Skinny the Skele
description:
Skinny! The average skeleton, is always made fun of by the denizens of their Halloween themed world. Calling him Skinny as an insult. The pumpkin being the most cruel and they cant even walk around!

Help Skele prove to the world you don't need muscles and skin to get around and can help anyone in this weird world, even the biggest smelliest pumpkins.

Controls:
WASD / Control Stick - Movement
E/ Gamepad Top Face button - Switch Weapon
Q/Gamepad Left Face button - Interact
RMB/Right Trigger - Aim
LMB/Left Trigger - Throw Bone (Must be aiming)

The game currently has around 5 Minutes of content, and has two interesting levels which show off, vicious slimes, interesting shooting mechanics and talkative NPCs
